name: Travel iN
description:
Travel iN, is a 2D platform game, Adventure-Dodge & Run style. This demo is created for the Platzi Olympics. The concept of the game is about What is reality?
Travel in one direction and another, discovering and avoiding obstacles to reach your destination. Create your own reality, only you can do it.

Controls:

Left Arrow or A : Move left.

Right Arrow or D: Move Right.

Space: Jump/Double jump, Hold for more jump.

Enter or R: Reset if you die.

Esc or P: Pause.

Developed by:

Daniel Peralta | @DanielP033

David Cornejo | @DavidCB98

Perspective Gaming | @Perspective033

Note: Version with absence of some mechanics and sounds that will be implemented in the future.
